epicontacts 1.1.3

    • `epicontacts` Class: Details Regarding the Data Structure for `epicontacts` Objects

Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

epicontacts 1.1.3 (2023-03-28) Unreleased

BUG FIXES

  • Small fix for CRAN warnings

epicontacts 1.1.2 (2021-10-19) 2021-10-21

BUG FIXES

  • plotting bug (blank plot) induced by changes to visNetwork in vis_epicontacts() has been fixed

epicontacts 1.1.1 (2018-9-18) Unreleased

NEW FEATURES

  • vis_epicontacts() gains an x_axis argument to specify a column to use for displaying dates.

BUG FIXES

  • vis_epicontacts() and plot() now both use same default thinning

epicontacts 1.1.0 (2017-11-20) 2017-11-21

NEW FEATURES

  • vis_epicontacts() now accepts fontawesome icon codes for node shapes

  • graph3D() will now plot an igraph object direct thanks to updates in threejs API

epicontacts 1.0.1 (2017-05-11) 2017-05-16

BUG FIXES

  • make_epicontacts now handles contacts provided as factors

  • added URL of website and issue system to DESCRIPTION

  • replaced javascript graphics in README.md with screenshots - these were not rendering on github

epicontacts 1.0.0 (2017-04-27) 2017-04-27

  • epicontacts now available on CRAN!

Contents
